attributes.action: Require all religions to prove that god or whatever deity they worship really exists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Religions are run like a business and should be subject to the trade descriptions act. As yet there has been
no evidence that can be tested for the existence of ANY god.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
